page_body:
# Welcome to Coffee Tycoon 7!

## Game Lore
In the heart of the city, your coffee shop stands as a beacon for all caffeine lovers. As the owner of this automated coffee haven, your goal is to serve the best coffee in town and grow your business empire. With each cup, you earn money and reputation, drawing more customers to your door.

## How to Play
- **Watch the Action**: Your coffee shop is fully automated. Customers will enter, order, and leave with their coffee without any input from you.
- **Earn Money**: Each coffee sold earns you $5. Keep an eye on your earnings displayed at the top of the screen.
- **Manage the Flow**: Ensure your shop runs smoothly by upgrading your facilities and staff.

## Upgrades
- **Additional Baristas**: Hire more baristas to serve coffee faster. Each additional barista costs $100, doubling with each purchase.
- **Additional Coffee Machines**: Increase your coffee-making capacity with more machines. Each new machine costs $200, doubling with each purchase.
- **Faster Baristas**: Speed up coffee preparation time. This upgrade costs $150, doubling with each purchase.
- **Larger Shop Space**: Accommodate more waiting customers by expanding your shop. This upgrade costs $300, doubling with each purchase.
- **Better Coffee Quality**: Enhance your coffee to earn more per sale. This upgrade costs $250, doubling with each purchase.

## Strategies for Success
- **Balance Your Upgrades**: Focus on a balanced approach to upgrades to ensure all aspects of your shop improve together.
- **Prioritize Efficiency**: Faster baristas and more machines can significantly increase your earnings by reducing wait times.
- **Expand Wisely**: Larger shop space is crucial as your customer base grows, but ensure you have the staff and machines to support it.

Embark on your journey to become the ultimate coffee tycoon and watch your profits soar in Coffee Tycoon 7!
